slides.title: Welcome to CIMA F2
slides.content:
# F2 - Advanced Financial Reporting

F2 covers **complex reporting** and **analysis**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Groups** - Complex structures
- **Standards** - Advanced IFRS
- **Analysis** - Interpretation
- **Issues** - Current developments

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Group accounting | 35% |
| Financial instruments | 25% |
| Analysis | 20% |
| Current issues | 20% |

slides.title: Complex Groups
slides.content:
# Group Structures

## Vertical Groups

```
Parent
   |
   v
Subsidiary
   |
   v
Sub-subsidiary
```

## Mixed Groups

| Structure | Ownership |
|-----------|----------|
| D-shaped | Multiple subs |
| Vertical | Chain |
| Mixed | Both |

## Effective Interest

```
P owns 80% of S
S owns 60% of SS
P's effective = 80% x 60% = 48%
```

slides.title: Associates and JVs
slides.content:
# Equity Method

## Associate

```
Significant influence (20-50%)
Equity method
```

## Joint Arrangement (IFRS 11)

| Type | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Joint operation | Proportionate |
| Joint venture | Equity method |

## Equity Method

```
Investment:
= Cost + Share of post-acq profits
- Dividends received
- Impairment
```

slides.title: IFRS 9 Financial Instruments
slides.content:
# Classification and Measurement

## Categories

| Category | Measurement |
|----------|-------------|
| Amortized cost | EIR |
| FVOCI | To OCI |
| FVPL | To P&L |

## Business Model Test

| Model | Objective |
|-------|----------|
| Hold to collect | Amortized |
| Collect and sell | FVOCI |
| Other | FVPL |

## SPPI Test

```
Solely Payments of Principal and Interest
```

slides.title: Impairment - ECL Model
slides.content:
# Expected Credit Losses

## Three Stages

| Stage | ECL | Interest |
|-------|-----|----------|
| 1 | 12-month | Gross |
| 2 | Lifetime | Gross |
| 3 | Lifetime | Net |

## Stage Movement

```
Initial: Stage 1
Credit risk increase: Stage 2
Credit-impaired: Stage 3
```

## Simplified Approach

- Trade receivables
- Lifetime ECL always

slides.title: Hedge Accounting
slides.content:
# Risk Management

## Hedge Types

| Type | Hedged Risk |
|------|-------------|
| Fair value | Value changes |
| Cash flow | Variability |
| Net investment | Translation |

## Effectiveness

| Requirement | Criterion |
|-------------|----------|
| Economic relationship | Between items |
| Credit risk | Not dominant |
| Hedge ratio | Appropriate |

## Accounting

- Fair value: P&L
- Cash flow: OCI then P&L

slides.title: Deferred Tax (IAS 12)
slides.content:
# Tax Accounting

## Temporary Differences

| Difference | Effect |
|------------|--------|
| Deductible | DT asset |
| Taxable | DT liability |

## Examples

| Item | Tax vs Book |
|------|-------------|
| PPE | Depreciation difference |
| Provisions | Timing |
| Losses | Carry forward |

## Recognition

```
DT Asset: Only if probable recovery
DT Liability: Always recognize
```

slides.title: Performance Analysis
slides.content:
# Financial Ratios

## Profitability

| Ratio | Formula |
|-------|--------|
| ROCE | PBIT / CE |
| Gross margin | GP / Revenue |
| Operating margin | PBIT / Revenue |

## Liquidity

| Ratio | Formula |
|-------|--------|
| Current | CA / CL |
| Quick | (CA - Inv) / CL |

## Gearing

| Ratio | Formula |
|-------|--------|
| Debt/Equity | D / E |
| Interest cover | PBIT / Interest |

slides.title: Cash Flow Analysis
slides.content:
# Statement of Cash Flows

## Categories

| Activity | Examples |
|----------|----------|
| Operating | Trading |
| Investing | PPE, investments |
| Financing | Debt, equity |

## Free Cash Flow

```
Operating cash flow
- Capital expenditure
= Free cash flow
```

## Analysis Points

- Quality of earnings
- Sustainability
- Investment pattern

slides.title: Share-Based Payments
slides.content:
# IFRS 2

## Types

| Type | Settlement |
|------|------------|
| Equity-settled | Shares |
| Cash-settled | Cash |

## Measurement

| Type | Basis |
|------|-------|
| Equity | Grant date FV |
| Cash | Reporting date FV |

## Vesting Conditions

| Type | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Service | Time-based |
| Performance (market) | Factor in FV |
| Performance (non-market) | Adjust number |

slides.title: Segment Reporting
slides.content:
# IFRS 8

## Operating Segments

```
Component that:
- Engages in activities
- Discrete financial info
- Regularly reviewed
```

## Quantitative Thresholds

| Test | Threshold |
|------|----------|
| Revenue | 10% |
| Profit/Loss | 10% |
| Assets | 10% |

## Disclosures

- Segment revenue
- Segment profit
- Segment assets
- Reconciliations
